-Nudity or sexual content

detailed_description: These are original artworks in original resolution. They are located in the game folder, inside the "Artwork" non-naked pictures with girls, also in the "Artwork" folder there is a Nude folder with naked girls pictures

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce gtx 200
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel core 9
  • Memory: 120 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
